prompt: Subject: The couple (Eleven and The Man, early 20s Chinese). Context: Cozy, intimate indoor setting with soft ambient light. Ambiance: Nostalgic, romantic atmosphere with flattering, emotive soft light. Text appears over the shot: 'Thursdays & Fridays at 12 PM'. 'On Hongchen Net'.
